content:
WorkflowRuntimeServiceState Enum

Definition

Specifies the state of the WorkflowRuntimeService.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public enum WorkflowRuntimeServiceState
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
WorkflowRuntimeServiceState
Attributes
ObsoleteAttribute

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

Fields

Started

Indicates that the WorkflowRuntimeService has started.
Starting

Indicates that the WorkflowRuntimeService is starting. stem.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start* changes the state of the WorkflowRuntimeService to Starting.
Stopped

Indicates that the WorkflowRuntimeService has stopped.
Stopping

Indicates that the WorkflowRuntimeService is stopping. stem.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop* changes the state of the WorkflowRuntimeService to Stopping.
